changeSet.author: jhipster
changeSet.createView:
select ROWNUM as id,temp.* from ( select tranship.frozen_tube_id as frozen_tube_id, tranship.project_code, tran.id as tranship_id, tran.tranship_code, null as stock_in_id, null as stock_in_code, null as stock_out_task_id, null as stock_out_task_code, null as handover_id, null as handover_code, tranship.sample_code, 101 as type, tranship.status,box.id as frozen_box_id,box.frozen_box_code,tranship.rows_in_tube as tube_rows,tranship.columns_in_tube as tube_columns ,tran.created_date as operate_time, (tbox.equipment_code||'.'||tbox.area_code||'.'||tbox.support_rack_code||'.'||tbox.columns_in_shelf||tbox.rows_in_shelf) as position, (tranship.ROWS_IN_TUBE||tranship.COLUMNS_IN_TUBE) as position_in_box, tbox.equipment_code,tbox.equipment_id,tbox.area_code,tbox.area_id,tbox.support_rack_code as shelves_code , tbox.support_rack_id as shelves_id, tbox.columns_in_shelf,tbox.rows_in_shelf,tranship.memo, u.last_name||u.first_name as operator, tranship.sample_type_id,tranship.sample_type_code,tranship.sample_type_name, tranship.frozen_tube_type_id,tranship.frozen_tube_type_code,tranship.frozen_tube_type_name,tranship.frozen_tube_volumns,tranship.frozen_tube_volumns_unit, tranship.sample_used_times_most,tranship.sample_used_times,tranship.sample_volumns, tranship.project_id, tranship.project_site_id,tranship.project_site_code, tranship.sample_classification_id, tranship.frozen_tube_state
from tranship_tube tranship left join tranship_box tbox on tranship.tranship_box_id = tbox.id left join tranship tran on tbox.tranship_id = tran.id left join frozen_box box on tbox.frozen_box_id = box.id left join jhi_user u on tran.receiver_id = u.id
UNION select stockIn.frozen_tube_id as frozen_tube_id, stockIn.project_code, null as tranship_id, null as tranship_code, s.id as stock_in_id, s.stock_in_code, null as stock_out_task_id, null as stock_out_task_code, null as handover_id, null as handover_code, stockIn.sample_code, 102 as type, stockIn.status,box.id as frozen_box_id,box.frozen_box_code,stockIn.tube_rows,stockIn.tube_columns ,s.created_date as operate_time, (sbox.equipment_code||'.'||sbox.area_code||'.'||sbox.support_rack_code||'.'||sbox.columns_in_shelf||sbox.rows_in_shelf) as position, (stockIn.tube_rows||stockIn.tube_columns) as position_in_box, sbox.equipment_code,sbox.equipment_id,sbox.area_code,sbox.area_id,sbox.support_rack_code as shelves_code , sbox.support_rack_id as shelves_id, sbox.columns_in_shelf,sbox.rows_in_shelf,stockIn.memo, u.last_name||u.first_name||','||u2.last_name||u2.first_name as operator, stockIn.sample_type_id,stockIn.sample_type_code,stockIn.sample_type_name, stockIn.frozen_tube_type_id,stockIn.frozen_tube_type_code,stockIn.frozen_tube_type_name,stockIn.frozen_tube_volumns,stockIn.frozen_tube_volumns_unit, stockIn.sample_used_times_most,stockIn.sample_used_times,stockIn.sample_volumns, stockIn.project_id, stockIn.project_site_id,stockIn.project_site_code, stockIn.sample_classification_id, stockIn.frozen_tube_state
from stock_in_tube stockIn left join stock_in_box sbox on stockIn.stock_in_box_id = sbox.id left join stock_in s on sbox.stock_in_id = s.id left join frozen_box box on sbox.frozen_box_id = box.id left join jhi_user u on s.store_keeper_id_1 = u.id left join jhi_user u2 on s.store_keeper_id_2 = u2.id
UNION select stockOut.frozen_tube_id as frozen_tube_id, stockOut.project_code, null as tranship_id, null as tranship_code, null as stock_in_id, null as stock_in_code, task.id as stock_out_task_id, task.stock_out_task_code, null as handover_id, null as handover_code, stockOut.sample_code, 103 as type, stockOut.status,box.id as frozen_box_id,box.frozen_box_code,stockOut.tube_rows,stockOut.tube_columns ,task.created_date as operate_time, (soutbox.equipment_code||'.'||soutbox.area_code||'.'||soutbox.support_rack_code||'.'||soutbox.columns_in_shelf||soutbox.rows_in_shelf) as position, (stockOut.tube_rows||stockOut.tube_columns) as position_in_box, soutbox.equipment_code,soutbox.equipment_id,soutbox.area_code,soutbox.area_id,soutbox.support_rack_code as shelves_code , soutbox.support_rack_id as shelves_id, soutbox.columns_in_shelf,soutbox.rows_in_shelf,stockOut.memo,u.last_name||u.first_name||','||u2.last_name||u2.first_name as operator, stockOut.sample_type_id,stockOut.sample_type_code,stockOut.sample_type_name, stockOut.frozen_tube_type_id,stockOut.frozen_tube_type_code,stockOut.frozen_tube_type_name,stockOut.frozen_tube_volumns,stockOut.frozen_tube_volumns_unit, stockOut.sample_used_times_most,stockOut.sample_used_times,stockOut.sample_volumns, stockOut.project_id, stockOut.project_site_id,stockOut.project_site_code, stockOut.sample_classification_id, stockOut.frozen_tube_state
from stock_out_box_tube stockOut left join stock_out_box soutbox on stockOut.stock_out_frozen_box_id = soutbox.id left join frozen_box box on soutbox.frozen_box_id = box.id left join stock_out_task task on soutbox.stock_out_task_id = task.id left join jhi_user u on task.stock_out_head_id_1 = u.id left join jhi_user u2 on task.stock_out_head_id_2 = u2.id
UNION select stockOut.frozen_tube_id as frozen_tube_id, stockOut.project_code, null as tranship_id, null as tranship_code, null as stock_in_id, null as stock_in_code, null as stock_out_task_id, null as stock_out_task_code, handover.id as handover_id, handover.handover_code, stockOut.sample_code, 104 as type, stockOut.status,box.id as frozen_box_id,box.frozen_box_code,stockOut.tube_rows,stockOut.tube_columns ,handover.handover_time as operate_time, (soutbox.equipment_code||'.'||soutbox.area_code||'.'||soutbox.support_rack_code||'.'||soutbox.columns_in_shelf||soutbox.rows_in_shelf) as position, (stockOut.tube_rows||stockOut.tube_columns) as position_in_box, soutbox.equipment_code,soutbox.equipment_id,soutbox.area_code,soutbox.area_id,soutbox.support_rack_code as shelves_code , soutbox.support_rack_id as shelves_id, soutbox.columns_in_shelf,soutbox.rows_in_shelf,hand.memo, u.last_name||u.first_name as operator, stockOut.sample_type_id,stockOut.sample_type_code,stockOut.sample_type_name, stockOut.frozen_tube_type_id,stockOut.frozen_tube_type_code,stockOut.frozen_tube_type_name,stockOut.frozen_tube_volumns,stockOut.frozen_tube_volumns_unit, stockOut.sample_used_times_most,stockOut.sample_used_times,stockOut.sample_volumns, stockOut.project_id, stockOut.project_site_id,stockOut.project_site_code, stockOut.sample_classification_id, stockOut.frozen_tube_state
from stock_out_handover_details hand left join stock_out_box_tube stockOut on hand.stock_out_box_tube_id = stockOut.id left join stock_out_box soutbox on stockOut.stock_out_frozen_box_id = soutbox.id left join frozen_box box on soutbox.frozen_box_id = box.id left join stock_out_handover handover on hand.stock_out_handover_id = handover.id left join jhi_user u on handover.handover_person_id = u.id
UNION select m.frozen_tube_id as frozen_tube_id, m.project_code, null as tranship_id, null as tranship_code, null as stock_in_id, null as stock_in_code, null as stock_out_task_id, null as stock_out_task_code, null as handover_id, null as handover_code, m.sample_code, 105 as type, m.status,m.frozen_box_id,m.frozen_box_code,m.tube_rows,m.tube_columns ,m.created_date as operate_time, (m.equipment_code||'.'||m.area_code||'.'||m.support_rack_code||'.'||m.columns_in_shelf||m.rows_in_shelf) as position, (m.tube_rows||m.tube_columns) as position_in_box, m.equipment_code,m.equipment_id,m.area_code,m.area_id,m.support_rack_code as shelves_code , m.support_rack_id as shelves_id, m.columns_in_shelf,m.rows_in_shelf,p.move_reason as memo ,u.last_name||u.first_name||','||u2.last_name||u2.first_name as operator, m.sample_type_id,m.sample_type_code,m.sample_type_name, m.frozen_tube_type_id,m.frozen_tube_type_code,m.frozen_tube_type_name,m.frozen_tube_volumns,m.frozen_tube_volumns_unit, m.sample_used_times_most,m.sample_used_times,m.sample_volumns, m.project_id, m.project_site_id,m.project_site_code, m.sample_classification_id, m.frozen_tube_state
from position_move_record m left join position_move p on m.position_move_id = p.id left join jhi_user u on p.operator_id_1 = u.id left join jhi_user u2 on p.operator_id_2 = u2.id
UNION select m.frozen_tube_id as frozen_tube_id, m.project_code, null as tranship_id, null as tranship_code, null as stock_in_id, null as stock_in_code, null as stock_out_task_id, null as stock_out_task_code, null as handover_id, null as handover_code, m.sample_code, 106 as type, m.status,m.frozen_box_id,m.frozen_box_code,m.tube_rows,m.tube_columns ,m.created_date as operate_time, (m.equipment_code||'.'||m.area_code||'.'||m.support_rack_code||'.'||m.columns_in_shelf||m.rows_in_shelf) as position, (m.tube_rows||m.tube_columns) as position_in_box, m.equipment_code,m.equipment_id,m.area_code,m.area_id,m.support_rack_code as shelves_code , m.support_rack_id as shelves_id, m.columns_in_shelf,m.rows_in_shelf,p.change_reason as memo ,u.last_name||u.first_name||','||u2.last_name||u2.first_name as operator, m.sample_type_id,m.sample_type_code,m.sample_type_name, m.frozen_tube_type_id,m.frozen_tube_type_code,m.frozen_tube_type_name,m.frozen_tube_volumns,m.frozen_tube_volumns_unit, m.sample_used_times_most,m.sample_used_times,m.sample_volumns, m.project_id, m.project_site_id,m.project_site_code, m.sample_classification_id, m.frozen_tube_state
from position_change_record m left join position_change p on m.position_change_id = p.id left join jhi_user u on p.operator_id_1 = u.id left join jhi_user u2 on p.operator_id_2 = u2.id
UNION select m.frozen_tube_id as frozen_tube_id, m.project_code, null as tranship_id, null as tranship_code, null as stock_in_id, null as stock_in_code, null as stock_out_task_id, null as stock_out_task_code, null as handover_id, null as handover_code, m.sample_code, 107 as type, m.status,m.frozen_box_id,m.frozen_box_code,m.tube_rows,m.tube_columns ,m.created_date as operate_time, (m.equipment_code||'.'||m.area_code||'.'||m.support_rack_code||'.'||m.columns_in_shelf||m.rows_in_shelf) as position, (m.tube_rows||m.tube_columns) as position_in_box, m.equipment_code,m.equipment_id,m.area_code,m.area_id,m.support_rack_code as shelves_code , m.support_rack_id as shelves_id, m.columns_in_shelf,m.rows_in_shelf,p.destroy_reason as memo ,u.last_name||u.first_name||','||u2.last_name||u2.first_name as operator, m.sample_type_id,m.sample_type_code,m.sample_type_name, m.frozen_tube_type_id,m.frozen_tube_type_code,m.frozen_tube_type_name,m.frozen_tube_volumns,m.frozen_tube_volumns_unit, m.sample_used_times_most,m.sample_used_times,m.sample_volumns, m.project_id, m.project_site_id,m.project_site_code, m.sample_classification_id, m.frozen_tube_state
from position_destroy_record m left join position_destroy p on m.position_destroy_id = p.id left join jhi_user u on p.operator_id_1 = u.id left join jhi_user u2 on p.operator_id_2 = u2.id
) temp ORDER BY operate_time desc
